summary: The Department of Defense is working to quickly develop hypersonic weapons, which are capable of moving at least 5 times the speed of sound and have unpredictable flight paths that could give the military a tactical advantage. Most of DOD's efforts to develop hypersonic weapons aren't using modern digital engineering tools, such as virtual representations of physical products. By not following this leading practice, they...
title: Hypersonic Weapons: DOD Could Reduce Cost and Schedule Risks by Following Leading Practices
